words.source: H559 ('amar, waw-consecutive Qal wayyiqtol 3ms) 'to say'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'said'
H3068 (YHWH, proper noun) the divine name; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H7200 (ra'ah, Qal infinitive absolute) 'to see'; emphatic infinitive absolute preceding finite verb; KJV 'I have surely', ESV 'I have surely', NASB 'I have certainly'
H7200 (ra'ah, Qal perfect 1cs) 'to see'; infinitive absolute + finite verb = emphatic 'I have surely seen'; KJV/ESV 'seen', NASB 'seen'
H853 ('et, direct object marker); untranslated in English
H6040 ('oni, noun common ms construct) 'affliction/misery'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'the affliction of'
H5971 ('am, noun common ms construct + 1cs suffix) 'my people'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'my people'
H834 ('asher, relative particle) 'who/which'; KJV 'which are', ESV 'who are', NASB 'who are'
H4714 (Mitsrayim, proper noun with preposition beth) 'in Egypt'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'in Egypt'
H853 ('et, direct object marker with conjunctive waw); untranslated in English
H6818 (tsa'aqah, noun common fs construct + 3mp suffix) 'cry/outcry'; KJV 'their cry', ESV 'their cry', NASB 'their cry'
H8085 (shama', Qal perfect 1cs) 'to hear'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'I have heard'
H6440 (panim, noun common both plural construct with preposition min) 'because of/on account of'; KJV 'by reason of', ESV 'because of', NASB 'because of'
H5065 (nagas, Qal active participle mp construct + 3ms suffix) 'taskmasters/oppressors'; KJV 'taskmasters', ESV 'taskmasters', NASB 'taskmasters'
H3045 (yada', Qal perfect 1cs) 'to know'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'I know'
H853 ('et, direct object marker); untranslated in English
H4341 (mak'ob, noun common mp construct + 3ms suffix) 'pain/suffering'; KJV 'their sorrows', ESV 'their sufferings', NASB 'their sufferings'
